trans-unit.source: T: Choose one of your creatures and have your opponent choose one of his or her creatures. Both target creatures become tapped. Your creature does its power in damage to your opponent's creature, and your opponent's creature does its power in damage to yours.
trans-unit.target: T: Choose one of your creatures and have your opponent choose one of his or her creatures. Both target creatures become tapped. Your creature does its power in damage to your opponent's creature, and your opponent's creature does its power in damage to yours.

trans-unit.resname: PHPR·2 | Sewers of Estark | Card Name
PHPR·2 | Sewers of Estark | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Choose one Target attacking creature is unblockable this turn; or prevent all combat damage that would be dealt by target blocking creature and all creatures it's blocking this turn.
trans-unit.target: Choose one Target attacking creature is unblockable this turn; or prevent all combat damage that would be dealt by target blocking creature and all creatures it's blocking this turn.

trans-unit.resname: PHPR·3 | Windseeker Centaur | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Attacking does not cause CARDNAME to tap.
trans-unit.target: Attacking does not cause CARDNAME to tap.

trans-unit.source: Loyal and passionate in battle, the Windseeker tribe roams the Green Lands near the Honeyed Sea.
trans-unit.target: Loyal and passionate in battle, the Windseeker tribe roams the Green Lands near the Honeyed Sea.

trans-unit.resname: PHPR·4 | Giant Badger | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: If assigned as a blocker, CARDNAME gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: If assigned as a blocker, CARDNAME gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

trans-unit.source: The wizard Greensleeves called a Giant Badger to her aid in an battle with the desert mage Karli.
trans-unit.target: The wizard Greensleeves called a Giant Badger to her aid in an battle with the desert mage Karli.

trans-unit.resname: PHPR·5 | Mana Crypt | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: During your upkeep, flip a coin. Opponent calls heads or tails while coin is in the air. If flip ends up in opponent's favor, CARDNAME deals 3 damage to you.
trans-unit.target: During your upkeep, flip a coin. Opponent calls heads or tails while coin is in the air. If flip ends up in opponent's favor, CARDNAME deals 3 damage to you.
